sentences.cn: 胸口上挨的很疼的一拳

sentences.en: A total solar eclipse is due to take place some time tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 明天某个时刻会发生日全食。

sentences.en: Another partial solar eclipse will be visible from the Philippines in July.
sentences.cn: 今年七月在菲律宾还可以看到一场日食.

sentences.en: Many astronomy lovers are already prepared to observe the solar eclipse.
sentences.cn: 很多天文爱好者已经做好了观测这次日蚀的准备.

sentences.en: Of course, tomorrow's annular solar eclipse is mostly for penguins.
sentences.cn: 当然, 明天的日环食大概只有企鹅才看得到.

sentences.en: Solar greenhouse is one of the high gardening establishment for planting.
sentences.cn: 日光温室是人类从事植物栽培的一种高级园艺设施.

sentences.en: The pink lacquered paint covers the bronze symbolizes solar energy and fire.
sentences.cn: 此雕刻以粉色包裹,象征着热情的精力与火.
他们精确地预告了日蚀.

sentences.en: This summer, I visited to Shanghai to watch solar eclipse.
sentences.cn: 今夏 、 我为了看日全食在(所以去)上海旅行了.

sentences.en: Today is her birthday according to the solar calendar.
sentences.cn: 按照阳历,今天是她的生日.

sentences.en: Total solar eclipse occurs, it will affect the safety of civil aviation?
sentences.cn: 日全食发生时, 是否会影响民航安全?

sentences.en: When there is solar halo , it will rain; when there is lunar halo , it will blow.
sentences.cn: 日晕而雨, 月晕而风.
